name: Ankama Launcher
description:
Ankama Launcher is a multi-game portal for all our games that lets you move from one to the next easily. It is currently in beta.
You can read the FAQ and post your comments on his Forum.

Head to the ultimate portal to the entire ANKAMA universe to enjoy truly unique adventures.

• Access to all of ANKAMA's universes with just one 
• Downloads and simplified installation of all 
• All latest info so you can always be up-to-date with the latest news
